attributes.action: demand an investigation into the AQA examination board
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 18 May 2009, GCSE maths students sat the non-calculator paper and to their amazement discovered that the majority of the paper was either not featured on the syllabus, impossible or ridiculous. This petition is in place to prevent this exam board getting away with this again, as it has already made blunders in the english literature exams of past years and to present this years students with their predicted grades so that this paper does not drastically alter their final GCSE grades and consequently their following prospects.
